arts.ttl: 'A hard one to take' - Van Nistelrooy reflects on big loss to Everton
arts.sum: Ruud van Nistelrooy says his Leciester side have to "take it on the chin" following a poor 4-0 loss away to Everton in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Everton score after TEN seconds in 4-0 triumph over Leicester
arts.sum: Everton scored the fourth-fastest goal in Premier League history as their revival under David Moyes continued with a resounding 4-0 defeat of Leicester City at Goodison Park. Everton made a dream start as Leicester failed to deal with Jordan Pickford ’s long ball, allowing Doucoure to burst into the box and drill home.

arts.ttl: Moyes 'making good progress' as Everton thrash Leicester
arts.sum: Everton boss David Moyes heaps praise on his players and the fans following his side's 4-0 drubbing of Leicester in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: David Moyes has liberated Everton from the Dyche straitjacket and is reaping the rewards
arts.sum: Everton 4-0 Leicester: Abdoulaye Doucoure scored the fastest goal in Everton history when he struck within 11 seconds to set them on course for another win

arts.ttl: Ruud van Nistelrooy bemoans Leicester’s poor start in Everton defeat
arts.sum: The struggling Foxes were two goals down after just six minutes at Goodison Park.

arts.ttl: David Moyes puts Everton board on notice ahead of move into £800m stadium
arts.sum: EVERTON 4-0 LEICESTER: David Moyes made it three wins in a row as Everton manager, as the Toffees made the most of a buoyant Goodison Park to hammer Ruud van Nistelrooy's Foxes

arts.ttl: 'Not a magician' but Moyes casts spell again at Everton
arts.sum: Just a couple of weeks ago, David Moyes said he "can't magician" Everton to some goals but the manager is waving his wand again in his second spell at Goodison Park.

arts.ttl: David Moyes gives Everton transfer update and latest on Charly Alcaraz deal
arts.sum: The Everton boss spoke about his transfer plans after the 4-0 hammering of Leicester on Saturday

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours: Kelechi Iheanacho to Celtic, Patrick Wimmer to Leicester City, Marcus Edwards to Burnley
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Kelechi Iheanacho to Celtic, Patrick Wimmer to Leicester City and Marcus Edwards to Burnley.

arts.ttl: What Beto did to delay pitch exit sums up Everton change as behind-the-scenes message pays off
arts.sum: Everton verdict from Joe Thomas after the clash with Leicester City at Goodison Park in the Premier League
